description: This dish uses one of my favorite techniques for cooking just about anything quickly: high-heat roasting All you do is spread seasoned protein and vegetables out on one rimmed baking sheet and roast everything at the same time Here I’ve paired shrimp with broccoli rabe, which cook in about 10 minutes flat.
title: Spicy Roasted Shrimp and Broccoli Rabe
title_page: Spicy Roasted Shrimp and Broccoli Rabe Recipe - NYT Cooking
text:
This dish uses one of my favorite techniques for cooking just about anything quickly: high-heat roasting. All you do is spread seasoned protein and vegetables out on one rimmed baking sheet and roast everything at the same time. Here I’ve paired shrimp with broccoli rabe, which cook in about 10 minutes flat.
Featured in: Shrimp And Broccoli Rabe, Done In A Flash.
